name: ArtsApp
tag_list: arts, arts-management, media-management, audition, audition-software, creative-arts, audition-management-software
overview:
ArtsApp is an audition and applicant management tool specializing in rich multimedia. We streamline the application and review process for Visual and Performing Arts Schools, and Professional Artist Programs.

ArtsApp connects arts education with modern technology by digitizing the process of artists submitting applications and audition media to arts organizations. While the core of our ArtsApp services is arts management software, ArtsApp.com also offers services that encourage artists and organizations to better integrate with technology, and discover new employment opportunities.

Current ArtsApp clients include the Juilliard School and the University of Cincinnati College-Conservatory of Music.

funding_rounds.source_description: William C. Norris Institute Portfolio Companies

financial_org.name: William C. Norris Institute at the University of St. Thomas Opus College of Buisness
